definition: no less than from heaven to the abyss (idiom); differing widely/worlds apart/the gap couldn't be bigger

sentences.english: You can share your experiences and ideas here and help make a world of difference.
sentences.chinese: 您可以分享您的经验和想法在这里和帮助是天渊之别。

sentences.english: First, the basic situation Shanxi jujube Co. , Ltd. is a great differences in joint-stock enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 基本情况山西天渊枣业有限公司属股份制企业。

sentences.english: But now how different everything was!
sentences.chinese: 同现在相比，真是天渊之别。

sentences.english: The truth is , there is a huge difference between being confident and being conceited.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，自信与自大有着天渊之别。

sentences.english: What I thought previously is totally different from what reality presents.
sentences.chinese: 之前所想像的和实际情况有天渊之别。

sentences.english: There is a huge divide between the women in the cities and in the villages.
sentences.chinese: 而城市妇女和农村妇女的地位和待遇则有天渊之别。

definition: lit. devils' castle/place occupied by sinister forces
Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu
the hidden and the visible/that which can be seen and that which cannot/darkness and light/night and day/wisdom and ignorance/evil and good/the living and the dead/men and ghosts
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
underground palace of ghouls, e.g. Asgard of Scandinavian mythology
